title: City Of Rocks National Reserve: Work With Us
body: Work With Us         Seasonal Rangers provide information, orientation, and interpretation to City of Rocks visitors, as well as collect fees and maintain facilities. NPS Photo  Current Openings City of Rocks National Reserve and Castle Rocks State Park offer a variety of employment opportunities each year. Currently all positions are filled.   Minimum Qualifications Full-time, classified positions have specific and professional standards and minimum qualifications specific to the position. Part-time, seasonal positions have minimum qualifications as follows:  US Citizen 18 years or older High School Diploma or Equivalency Valid Driver's License Drug Free    How to Apply For part-time, seasonal positions e-mail us or mail a one-page resume' to: Park Superintendent City of Rocks National Reserve PO Box 169 Almo, ID 83312  For additional Information, call the park superintendent at (208) 824-5911
